channel.title: AI Research on InfiX-AI
channel.description: Recent content in AI Research on InfiX-AI

item.title: InfiGUI-R1: Advancing Multimodal GUI Agents from Reactive Actors to Deliberative Reasoners
item.description: InfiGUI-R1 is a multimodal large language model-based GUI agent trained using reinforcement learning to enhance planning and error recovery skills for GUI tasks, achieving state-of-the-art performance on multiple benchmarks.
